      • waitForPageCount

        public SiteadminActions waitForPageCount(int pageCount)
        Description copied from interface: SiteadminActions
        Waits until there is requested number of subPages on actual page list. During waiting page is reloaded several times.
        Specified by:
        waitForPageCount in interface SiteadminActions
        Parameters:
        pageCount - number of pages that is expected to appear
        Returns:
        this SiteadminPage
